options.name: Minor Planar Magic
options.description: You learn 4 Beginner Spells from the Fiend or Pyromancy schools of magic.

options.name: Action : Break Flame
options.description: You target a creature that is Ignited of Frozen within 12 units and immediately end the condition.

options.name: Firecraft
options.description: Your skills at manipulating flames has given you a bonus to crafting. Gain +1 Cooking, Alchemy and Smithing

options.name: Infernal Speech
options.description: You gain the Infernal Language and gain +1 Spell Damage

options.name: Action [Daily] : Elemental Form
options.description: You take the form of a Fire Sprite, gaining it's stat block for 1 minute or until you reach 0 Health. At Level 5, this ability improves, allowing you to take the form of an Fire Elementaling instead. At Level 9, you can take the form of an Fire Elemental

options.name: Lesser Planar Magic
options.description: You learn 4 Novice Spells from the Fiend or Pyromancy schools of magic.

options.name: Free Action : Devil's Whip
options.description: You summon a whip of fire and immediately make a light 1-handed slashing attack against a creature within 3 units, dealing fire damage. On a True Hit, the creature becomes ignited.

options.name: Devil's Sight
options.description: You gain +2 Search and Ultravision, but suffer a -4 penalty to your Divine Mitigation.

options.name: Planar Magic
options.description: You learn 4 Journeyman Spells from the Fiend or Pyromancy schools of magic.

options.name: Burning Resolve
options.description: Gain +1 Resilience and Immunity to the Diseased and Poisoned Conditions

options.name: Action [Daily] : Hellsteed
options.description: You touch a Horse, transforming it into a Nightmare which is considered your pet. This enchantment lasts until the Nightmare dies, which it returns to the Infernal Plane. Only one horse can be transformed by this enchantment at a time.

options.name: Greater Planar Magic
options.description: You learn 4 Expert Spells from the Fiend or Pyromancy schools of magic. At level 10, learn 2 Master Spells from the Fiend or Pyromancy schools of magic. Additionally, gain +1 Spell Attack and +1 Spell Damage.

options.name: Reaction : Vengeful Flames
options.description: In response to a creature within 10 units dealing damage to you, curse them with fire, dealing damage equal to twice your level which cannot be defended against.

options.name: Infernal Connection
options.description: You have a connection with the Infernal Plane, or one of it's adjacent planes, manifesting in minor or major changes to your appearance.
